title: Ticket #1416: Privstate leakage in vanilla starter
description: While preforming code inspection in src/condor_starter.V6.1/os_proc.cpp, I noticed that when we open the stdfiles in OsProc::StartJob(), we change to the user's privstate, however, a little bit later, if we fail to insert JOB_RENICE_INCREMENT into the job ad, we bail, but never reset the privstate to the original setting. It appears to me that a few other error code paths also do not reset the privstate properly upon exiting from OsProc::StartJob().
remarks:
